data.eml:eml: Trifurcula (Glaucolepis) lituanica sp. nov., an unexpected new stem-miner on Salvia pratensis occurring in eastern Europe (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ivinskis, Povilas, Van, Erik J., Rimsaite, Jolanta (2012): Trifurcula (Glaucolepis) lituanica sp. nov., an unexpected new stem-miner on Salvia pratensis occurring in eastern Europe (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae). Zootaxa 3570: 41-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.283000
